item.title: Zuul Hands on - part 6 - Cross project dependencies
item.description:
In this article, we will explain how project dependencies work in Zuul.

This article is part of the Zuul hands-on series.

The examples and commands that follow are intended to be run on a Software Factory sandbox where a demo-repo repository exists. You should have such an environment after following â€¦
item.dc:creator: Zoltan Caplovi
